formatted_address: 1, Lebuh Medini Utara, 79200 Iskandar Puteri, Johor, Malaysia
name: 3littlechef @ Medini

reviews.text: Stumbled upon this cozy café tucked away in Medini – definitely a hidden gem! The place has a beautiful little garden that gives off super relaxing vibes. It’s perfect for high tea, catching up with friends, or just unwinding solo. Service was warm and friendly, which made the experience even better. If you're looking for a chill spot to escape the city buzz, this one’s worth checking out.

Great food, great environment!

Some seating area comes with big mirror  to keep our dining experience more private and cozy.

Very cosy and friendly dining environment.
Always our favourite place to visit whenever we are nearby.
Earl grey burntcheese cake  is mostly our SOP after coffee！
They have a strawberry and mango tea is strongly recommended to go with this sweet ending!

Not forgetting to buy some dessert takeaway too ! Always selling fast!!

3littlechef  is a delightful gem for brunch enthusiasts!

The menu offers both delicious and visually stunning options, making every meal a treat for the senses.

The cakes, though not overly sweet, are perfectly complemented by a soothing cup of coffee.
The atmosphere exudes charm, and the service is top-notch. A definite must-visit for anyone craving a tasteful experience.

Food was okay. Nice Ambience since the weather in Malaysia quite cold now. If hujan, got shelter but limited
Free parking, spacious.

Fries sedap!
Spacious dining area, clean and tidy tables and chairs, comfortable air circulation. The volcano beef looks good and tastes good. French fries and popcorn chicken are also delicious
